body:
I'm sad to tell you that I'm leaving avicus.
I just don't think avicus is as good like it was mounths or ages ago.
Community changed alot, Some staff members are doing their job wrong, I'm getting bored with the game.
I just don't think this is going well for avicus.
Thanks for everything, I will still come sometimes to enjoy some good moments with old friends.

replies.body:
First Joe, now you. I swear, the list of people that I can be myself with gets smaller every day...

Good luck mate. I'm sad that we staff members contributed to you leaving, but be sure to pop back to visit once in a while.

Have fun and just like Joe I wish you all the luck in the world. <3 :'(
